channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: US halts all asylum decisions as suspect in shooting of National Guard members faces murder charge
item.description: The Trump administration has halted all asylum decisions and paused issuing visas for people traveling on Afghan passports in the wake of a shooting that left one National Guard member dead and another in critical condition near the White House.

item.title: Winter storm warnings stretch across the northern US, bringing snow, cold and risky conditions
Trump officials and judge face off over flights to El Salvador in rare, high-stakes contempt probe
